languages.text: {n}Равор пытается поймать вас в прицел, но прежде падает на палубу. Изо рта у него идет кровавая пена.{/n} "Нет! Лорд-капитан в опасности! Должен... защи...!" {n}Кормчий замирает, его грудь тяжело вздымается. Рана тяжела, но не смертельна, если ему быстро окажут помощь.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: игрок атакует, равор падает в 1 хп
игрок атакует, равор падает в 1 хп

languages.text: {n}Ravor tries to catch you in his sights, but falls to the deck before he can steady his hand. There is bloody foam bubbling from his mouth.{/n} "No! The Lord Captain is in danger! I must... protect..." {n}He stops, his chest rising and falling heavily. He is badly wounded, but he will live if he receives help soon.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Равор пытается поймать вас в прицел, но прежде падает на палубу. Изо рта у него идет кровавая пена.{/n} "Нет! Лорд-капитан в опасности! Должен... защи...!" {n}Кормчий замирает, его грудь тяжело вздымается. Рана тяжела, но не смертельна, если ему быстро окажут помощь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ravor intenta apuntarte, pero cae al suelo antes de poder estabilizar la mano. De su boca salen espumarajos sanguinolentos.{/n} «¡No! ¡{mf|El|La} Lord Capitán corre peligro! Debo... proteger...». {n}Guarda silencio, su pecho sube y baja trabajosamente. Está muy malherido, pero sobrevivirá si recibe atención médica pronto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor tries to catch you in his sights, but falls to the deck before he can steady his hand. There is bloody foam bubbling from his mouth.{/n} "No! The Lord Captain is in danger! I must... protect..." {n}He stops, his chest rising and falling heavily. He is badly wounded, but he will live if he receives help soon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor intenta apuntarte, pero cae al suelo antes de poder estabilizar la mano. De su boca salen espumarajos sanguinolentos.{/n} «¡No! ¡{mf|El|La} Lord Capitán corre peligro! Debo... proteger...». {n}Guarda silencio, su pecho sube y baja trabajosamente. Está muy malherido, pero sobrevivirá si recibe atención médica pronto.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアは、こちらを視界に捉えようとするが、手が安定せず、デッキへ倒れこむ。彼の口からは血の泡が噴き出している。{/n}「ダメだ！ロード・キャプテンが危ない！私が…守らなければ…」{n}彼は動きを止める。その胸が大きく上下する。彼は酷く負傷しているが、早期に救助が得られれば、死ぬことはないだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor tries to catch you in his sights, but falls to the deck before he can steady his hand. There is bloody foam bubbling from his mouth.{/n} "No! The Lord Captain is in danger! I must... protect..." {n}He stops, his chest rising and falling heavily. He is badly wounded, but he will live if he receives help soon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアは、こちらを視界に捉えようとするが、手が安定せず、デッキへ倒れこむ。彼の口からは血の泡が噴き出している。{/n}「ダメだ！ロード・キャプテンが危ない！私が…守らなければ…」{n}彼は動きを止める。その胸が大きく上下する。彼は酷く負傷しているが、早期に救助が得られれば、死ぬことはないだろう。{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}雷沃试图将你抓住，但他的手抖个不停。他倒在了甲板上，嘴里泛着血沫。{/n}“不！舰长大人遇到了危险！我必须……保护……”{n}他的声音戛然而止，胸口沉重地起伏着。尽管他伤得很重，但如果能很快得到救治的话，应该是能活下来的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor tries to catch you in his sights, but falls to the deck before he can steady his hand. There is bloody foam bubbling from his mouth.{/n} "No! The Lord Captain is in danger! I must... protect..." {n}He stops, his chest rising and falling heavily. He is badly wounded, but he will live if he receives help soon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃试图将你抓住，但他的手抖个不停。他倒在了甲板上，嘴里泛着血沫。{/n}“不！舰长大人遇到了危险！我必须……保护……”{n}他的声音戛然而止，胸口沉重地起伏着。尽管他伤得很重，但如果能很快得到救治的话，应该是能活下来的。{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Ravor versucht, dich anzuvisieren, fällt aber zu Boden, ehe ihm dies gelingt. Blutiger Schaum quillt ihm aus dem Mund.{/n} "Nein! Der Lord Captain ist in Gefahr! Ich muss ... beschützen ..." {n}Er verstummt. Seine Brust hebt und senkt sich schwer. Er ist schwer verletzt, wird aber überleben, wenn ihm rasch geholfen wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor tries to catch you in his sights, but falls to the deck before he can steady his hand. There is bloody foam bubbling from his mouth.{/n} "No! The Lord Captain is in danger! I must... protect..." {n}He stops, his chest rising and falling heavily. He is badly wounded, but he will live if he receives help soon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor versucht, dich anzuvisieren, fällt aber zu Boden, ehe ihm dies gelingt. Blutiger Schaum quillt ihm aus dem Mund.{/n} "Nein! Der Lord Captain ist in Gefahr! Ich muss ... beschützen ..." {n}Er verstummt. Seine Brust hebt und senkt sich schwer. Er ist schwer verletzt, wird aber überleben, wenn ihm rasch geholfen wird.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Ravor lève son arme dans votre direction, mais s'effondre avant de pouvoir stabiliser sa main, la bouche couverte d'une écume écarlate.{/n} « Non ! {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} est en danger ! Je dois... protéger... » {n}Il s'interrompt, à bout de souffle. Il est grièvement blessé, mais survivra s'il est rapidement pris en charge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor tries to catch you in his sights, but falls to the deck before he can steady his hand. There is bloody foam bubbling from his mouth.{/n} "No! The Lord Captain is in danger! I must... protect..." {n}He stops, his chest rising and falling heavily. He is badly wounded, but he will live if he receives help soon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor lève son arme dans votre direction, mais s'effondre avant de pouvoir stabiliser sa main, la bouche couverte d'une écume écarlate.{/n} « Non ! {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} est en danger ! Je dois... protéger... » {n}Il s'interrompt, à bout de souffle. Il est grièvement blessé, mais survivra s'il est rapidement pris en charge.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Ravor sana nişan almaya çalışıyor ama elini doğrultamadan güvertenin zeminine yığılıyor. Ağzından kanlı köpükler çıkıyor.{/n} "Hayır! Lord Kaptan tehlike altında! Onu... Korumalıyım..." {n}Konuşmayı kesiyor. Göğsü ağır ağır inip kalkıyor. Ağır yaralı ama yakın zamanda yardım alırsa yaşayacak.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor tries to catch you in his sights, but falls to the deck before he can steady his hand. There is bloody foam bubbling from his mouth.{/n} "No! The Lord Captain is in danger! I must... protect..." {n}He stops, his chest rising and falling heavily. He is badly wounded, but he will live if he receives help soon.{/n}
